title: Himi 294
lyrics:
M.K.
1.
Ke tau hosana, ki hotau Misaia;
Mo ongoongoa, ‘a ’ene ‘Afio.
Tau hiva kalanga, mo toe hosana;
Ki hotau hao’anga,’i he ‘etau hia;
Haleluia kia Sīsū, ko hotau Misaia,
Ko hotau hūfanga, ke tau monū’ia.
2.
Kau tui mo’oni ki he pule lelei,
‘A hotau Huhu’i, kia kitautolu,
Ke tau fiefia, mo hiva mālohi,
‘I he’etu ‘ilo ‘a hotau ‘Otua,
Haleluia ki he Lami, ne ne fakamo’ui.
Hotau laumālie mei he’etau hia.
3.
Pea ka tau ka hoko ki hēvani,
Ko e pule’anga, ‘o hotau ‘Otua,
Tau toe hosana, ‘o ‘ai ki ‘olunga,
Ki hotau Misaia,ko hotau ‘Otua
‘O fai haleluia, ki hotau Misaia,
Mo toe hosana ‘o ‘ikai ke ngata. *
